analysisEngineMetaData.name: WncConsumerDescriptor
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
A WncConsumer prints out a statistic for all tokens with a word number, the word and it's frequency per line. This output is ordered by the frequency with the most frequent word at the beginning. The output columns are separated by TAB-characters and the wordnumber is calculated within this consumer. This consumer expects a tokenized view as for example created by the TokenizerAnnotator. A possible flow could contain a SentenceReader, a TokenizerAnnotator and a WncConsumer.
There are two parameters : the name of the output file and it's character encoding.
The statistics can need a lot of RAM as every token needs to be stored.

configurationParameter.name: outputFileName
configurationParameter.description: Name of the file the output will be written to. If a file with this name already exists it will be overwritten.

configurationParameter.name: outputEncoding
configurationParameter.description: The character set used for output
